DOC.criteria: IVF patient day 3 embryo transfer Maximum age 39 year Maximum FSH 9 mIU/ml Maximum E2 75 pg/ml Ovulatory menstrual cycle Good embryo quality Diagnosis diminish ovarian reserve , polycystic ovarian syndrome , uterine egg factor infertility More one previous unsuccessful IVF cycle
